mapper.select: SELECT TB_STU.STU_NO AS STU_NO , TB_STU.USER_NM AS USER_NM , TB_STU.SVLF_NO AS SVLF_NO , TB_STU.USER_EML_ADDR AS USER_EML_ADDR , TB_STU.USER_PHONENO AS USER_PHONENO , TB_STU.USER_ZIP AS USER_ZIP , TB_STU.USER_ADDR AS USER_ADDR , TB_STU.USER_DADDR AS USER_DADDR , TB_STU.REG_DT AS REG_DT , TB_STU.FNSH_DT AS FNSH_DT , TB_STU.FNSH_YN AS FNSH_YN , TB_STU.ABD_YN AS ABD_YN , TB_STU.JOIN_DT AS JOIN_DT , TB_STU.USER_PROFILE AS USER_PROFILE , TB_STU.USER_PRVC_YN AS USER_PRVC_YN , TB_STU.USER_BRDT AS USER_BRDT , TB_STU.USER_GENDER AS USER_GENDER , TB_SVLF.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO FROM TB_STU FULL OUTER JOIN TB_SVLF ON TB_SVLF.SVLF_NO = TB_STU.SVLF_NO WHERE TB_SVLF.EMP_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY TB_STU.USER_NM
